languages.text: Мануфакторум был полностью переоснащен с обработки породы и металла для иного, куда более зловещего производства: на линиях налажено изготовление оболочек для демонических орудий.
The manufactorum has been completely converted from rock and metal processing to a much more sinister purpose: the lines have been set up to manufacture shells for Daemon Engines.
languages.original_text: Мануфакторум был полностью переоснащен с обработки породы и металла для иного, куда более зловещего производства: на линиях налажено изготовление оболочек для демонических орудий.

traits.locale_text: The manufactorum has been completely converted from rock and metal processing to a much more sinister purpose: the lines have been set up to manufacture shells for Daemon Engines.
The manufactorum has been completely converted from rock and metal processing to a much more sinister purpose: the lines have been set up to manufacture shells for Daemon Engines.
The manufactorum has been completely converted from rock and metal processing to a much more sinister purpose: the lines have been set up to manufacture shells for Daemon Engines.

languages.text: El manufactorum se ha reconvertido por completo del procesamiento de roca y metal a una función mucho más siniestra: está preparado para fabricar armazones de ingenios daemónicos.
languages.original_text: The manufactorum has been completely converted from rock and metal processing to a much more sinister purpose: the lines have been set up to manufacture shells for Daemon Engines.

traits.locale_text: El manufactorum se ha reconvertido por completo del procesamiento de roca y metal a una función mucho más siniestra: está preparado para fabricar armazones de ingenios daemónicos.

languages.text: 这座制造工厂不再加工岩石与金属，而被用于更加邪恶的目的。这些已经组装完毕的生产线，如今用来生产恶魔引擎的外壳。
languages.original_text: The manufactorum has been completely converted from rock and metal processing to a much more sinister purpose: the lines have been set up to manufacture shells for Daemon Engines.

traits.locale_text: 这座制造工厂不再加工岩石与金属，而被用于更加邪恶的目的。这些已经组装完毕的生产线，如今用来生产恶魔引擎的外壳。

languages.text: 聖工場は岩と金属の加工場から、もっと邪悪な目的のものへと完全に改造されている：魔導兵器の砲弾を製造するラインが設置されている。
languages.original_text: The manufactorum has been completely converted from rock and metal processing to a much more sinister purpose: the lines have been set up to manufacture shells for Daemon Engines.

traits.locale_text: 聖工場は岩と金属の加工場から、もっと邪悪な目的のものへと完全に改造されている：魔導兵器の砲弾を製造するラインが設置されている。

languages.text: Le manufactorum a été entièrement reconverti pour passer du traitement de la roche et du métal à une activité bien plus sinistre : la fabrication de matrices de machines-démons.
languages.original_text: The manufactorum has been completely converted from rock and metal processing to a much more sinister purpose: the lines have been set up to manufacture shells for Daemon Engines.

traits.locale_text: Le manufactorum a été entièrement reconverti pour passer du traitement de la roche et du métal à une activité bien plus sinistre : la fabrication de matrices de machines-démons.

languages.text: Das Manufactorum wurde von der Verarbeitung von Stein und Metall zu einem weitaus unheilvolleren Zweck umfunktioniert: Die Förderbänder sollen nun Hüllen für Dämonenmaschinen herstellen.
languages.original_text: The manufactorum has been completely converted from rock and metal processing to a much more sinister purpose: the lines have been set up to manufacture shells for Daemon Engines.

traits.locale_text: Das Manufactorum wurde von der Verarbeitung von Stein und Metall zu einem weitaus unheilvolleren Zweck umfunktioniert: Die Förderbänder sollen nun Hüllen für Dämonenmaschinen herstellen.

languages.text: Manufaktorum, kaya ve metal işlemekten tamamıyla çıkartılarak çok daha uğursuz bir amaca hizmet eder olmuş. Hatlar, İblis Motorlarına kabuk üretecek şekilde düzenlenmiş.
languages.original_text: The manufactorum has been completely converted from rock and metal processing to a much more sinister purpose: the lines have been set up to manufacture shells for Daemon Engines.
